name: Go-Contact
author: Rahul Balakrishna

sections.description:
Go-Contact is powerful plugin because it provides the admin to execute Javascript and PHP code when the form is submitted by the user.

Also a facility to auto download a file when the user have submitted the form, all you have to do is provide the url of the file

Note: Adding any javascript or php code which has bugs in it, will affect the working of the plugin. So use it carefully.
sections.installation:
1. Upload go-contact to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a form in the “Create Option” under “Go-Contact” menu
  4. Then go to the “Edit Form”, copy the shortcode and paste it on the specific page/post where you want to display the form.
sections.faq: If you have any queries fell free to email me on iamdeveloper212@gmail.com.
sections.changelog:
1. Added User information which let’s the user know which field performs what type of functionality.
  2. Removed “ID” column and added “Shortcode” column in Edit form page. As it will be more convenient for user to copy and paste the shortcode instead of typing it.

short_description: Go-Contact is a powerful plugin where user can create dynamic form and manage them i.e. edit and delete it.
